info.description: Additional services and surcharges offered by a company

color_print_surcharge.description: Additional cost per page for color printing

lamination_surcharge.description: Additional flat fee for lamination service

binding_surcharge.description: Additional flat fee for binding service

photocopy_cost_per_page.description: Cost per page for photocopying (if different from printing)

scanning_cost_per_page.description: Cost per page for scanning service
